title: More Dynamics, Less Statics
content: Now the site can actually be built on the fly, not just from static pages, that's a big leap in delivery!

title: Dev Team Update
content: More planning is finished, and now we've actually gotten to building the thing. New name in the works, likely favoring Squeeb.

title: Good News Everyone!
content: The Archives alpha is almost planned out! We hope to have the alpha ready by the end of the term!
